member.name: NMMOUSE
member.summary: Contains information used with mouse notification messages.

member.name: NMMOUSE.hdr
member.summary: An structure that contains additional information about this notification.

member.name: NMMOUSE.pt
member.summary: A structure that contains the client coordinates of the mouse when the click occurred.

member.name: NMMOUSE.dwHitInfo
member.summary: Carries information about where on the item or control the cursor is pointing.
